crazyballrun.game.gui.controls

Class CBListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.gui.GUIControl
      • crazyballrun.game.gui.controls.CBListBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IListener, IControlObserver, IControlSubscriber

    public class CBListBox
extends GUIControl
implements IListener, IControlObserver, IControlSubscriber
    Simple ListBox GUI-element which can be used for game settings and file- and folder-selection.
